feed.title: Snubs
feed.subtitle: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.

author.name: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

entry.title: Rushmore - Season 1 Episode 27
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Wes Anderson’s, Rushmore, and the 1999 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline does not let Chris get a word in edgewise and Chris thinks Wes Anderson movies are like a warm cup of hot coco in the winter.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: The Breakfast Club - Season 1 Episode 26
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss John Hughes’, The Breakfast Club, and the 1986 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline does not understand the qualifications needed to join the “Brat Pack”, and Chris is just chock full of fun facts.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: The Perks Of Being A Wallflower - Season 1 Episode 25

link.title: The Perks Of Being A Wallflower - Season 1 Episode 25

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts, along with special guest Ryan Young (Caroline’s brother), discuss the teen drama The Perks of Being a Wallflower, and the 2013 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline sees herself in Emma Watson’s character (if she squints really really hard), Chris is a sucker for sentimentality, and Ryan has an unusual tunnel song.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Big Eyes - Season 1 Episode 24
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Tim Burton’s, Big Eyes, and the 2015 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline does not think Chris understood the assignment, and Chris thinks that’s hysterical. This entire episode goes a bit off the rails.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast

entry.title: Prisoners - Season 1 Episode 23
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Denis Villeneuve’s, Prisoners, and the 2014 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is the president of the Paul Dano fan club, and Chris can not pronounce “Denis Villeneuve” to save his life.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Wild Card: When Harry Met Sally…/Gone Girl - Season 1 Episode 22

link.title: Wild Card: When Harry Met Sally…/Gone Girl - Season 1 Episode 22

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this special Wild Card episode, our titular hosts discuss Rob Reiner’s When Harry Met Sally… and David Fincher’s Gone Girl, and the Academy Awards they were noticeably absent from. Usually these films are ineligible, but this week we made an exception. Caroline thinks Amy Dunne may have had a point, and Chris may riot if they ever tried to remake When Harry Met Sally.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Scarface - Season 1 Episode 21
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Brian De Palma’s, Scarface, and the 1984 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline insists that Michelle Pfeiffer is a Best Supporting Actress contender, Chris has become a gentleman and a scholar, and they both have the giggles.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: The Princess Bride - Season 1 Episode 20
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Rob Reiner’s, The Princess Bride, and the 1988 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is rattled by the amount of potential Snubs picks this year, and Chris is out for blood.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Rocketman - Season 1 Episode 19
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Dexter Fletcher’s, Rocketman, and the 2020 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is in awe of the Benny and the Jets scene, and Chris has to face the consequences of his former Snubs actions when discussing the Best Actor category.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast

entry.title: Legally Blonde - Season 1 Episode 18
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Reese Witherspoon’s magnum opus, Legally Blonde, and the 2002 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline has a real soft spot for Luke Wilson, and Chris would do surprisingly well in a sorority.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/
